body:
### What is BlockCrusher?
BlockCrusher is a [Bukkit](http://bukkit.org) plugin which operates as an API for the popular Minecraft game. BlockCrusher extends the functionality of Pistons in Minecraft to allow blocks to break when pushed against a block which is _un-pushable_. Instead of not pushing any more blocks, the plugin allows for blocks to break naturally. 


### Configuration
The plugin allows for three different methods of breaking blocks:

1. First - The block being pushed is broken.
2. Last - The block being pushed against an _un-pushable_ is broken.
3. All - All blocks from the block being pushed to the last block are broken.
